attributes.action: Stop drug dealing, and the violence that goes with it, by abolishing cash.
attributes.additional_details:
Most law abiding citizens only use cash when dealing with an illegal vendor or other criminals avoiding tax.
When crime plumettes the effect upon our police, courts and prisons would be breathtaking.
The increased tax revenue would fix the NHS, solve the social care issue, and much more.
All we need to do is open a bank account!
If you want your children to grow up in a country without drugs, and the violence and misery they cause, then signing this petition is the ONLY WAY you can help them.
attributes.background:
Cash is only NEEDED to hide financial transactions from the police and HMRC.
If cash is abolished, and replaced by card transactions, virtually all illegal financial transactions will cease.
Our society will become safer and fairer overnight.
Most muggers, thieves and tax evaders would be stopped

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how abolishing cash would stop drug dealing.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
